short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife of a neon-lit city

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife of a neon-lit city with this extension. The background features a breathtaking cityscape reflected on the calm waters, blending the urban skyline's modern architecture with the serene tranquility of night. Perfect for those who love the captivating allure of a city that never sleeps.
